name: Soulless (Raw Egg Studio, lacklustrr, Beowulf, cinderwild, Da4RealDeal, SiriusVictoria)
name_original: Soulless (Raw Egg Studio, lacklustrr, Beowulf, cinderwild, Da4RealDeal, SiriusVictoria)
description:
He came. Lurking in the dark.

He took your soul and locked it in a jar...

And -oh no!- you can't just let that be.

You must go and take his key!

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Jam 2021.
